channel.title: C++ Server Login
channel.description: I want to make a c++ program that will null connect to a runescape private server. Which will allow me to make a simple way to test if the server is online and so I can test some things with nulling on my server. I was wondering how to come about getting it to login to the server ANY SOURCE BASES would be appreciated. I can easily code the rest its just the whole connecting I am not good with.
